title: The LAN  indicator is  off. Why?
answer:
Check as follows:
(1) Ensure that you are using the appropriate network cable,
(2) Ensure that the network cable is connected properly,
(3) Ensure that the indicator of the network adapter is on,
(4) Ensure that the network adapter is running normally. You can check it as follows: Right-click My Computer to select Properties. Choose Hardware > Device Manager. Check whether there are devices with the ? or ! mark under Network adapters. If there is such a device, delete and re-install it. Alternatively, change the network adapter slot or replace the network adapter. If the problem persists, replace the network adapter.
